content.webTitle: GUARDIAN UNLIMITED REVEALS SEPTEMBER 04 GLOBAL AUDIENCE BREAKDOWN

fields.headline: GUARDIAN UNLIMITED REVEALS SEPTEMBER 04 GLOBAL AUDIENCE BREAKDOWN
fields.bodyText: In a first for an online newspaper, Guardian Unlimited began revealing the geographic breakdown of its users in January and makes the figures available on a quarterly basis. As well as offering increased transparency to advertisers, the figures also show the extent to which Guardian Unlimited has established itself as a global media brand. Figures for Sept 2004 show that the largest proportion of Guardian Unlimited's 9.5 million unique users come from the US and the largest proportion of Guardian Unlimited's 96.5 million page impressions come from the UK, demonstrating the depth of UK users' penetration of the site's network. GU Users Top ten countries (Sept 04) County / Percentage of GU Users United States 46.1 United Kingdom 26.3 Canada 4.23 Australia 3.13 Reserved/private/anon 1.94 Germany 1.73 Europe (unknown Country)1.26 Netherlands 1.16 France 1.01 Spain 0.82 GU Page Impressions Top ten countries (Sept 04) Country / Percentage of GU page views United Kingdom 46.74 United States 23.83 Canada 3.22 Australia 2.65 Germany 2.12 France 2.02 Netherlands 1.31 Ireland 1.11 Spain 1.02 Norway 0.96 Guardian Unlimited has grown exponentially since its launch at the beginning of 1999. The network - now five years old - currently boasts 16 sites dedicated to news, sport, media, travel, film, books, arts, business and politics to name a few. It frequently scoops other news organisations and in 2001 become the most popular UK newspaper website. Its reach extended further after September 11 and in the run up to, and throughout the Iraq war, serving millions of page impressions and attracting numerous plaudits from the US and around the world for its in-depth and independent reporting. Comscore shows that Guardian Unlimited is the fourth biggest provider of online news globally. The network detects the whereabouts of its users by their IP addresses which supplier Digital Envoy converts into geographic locations. Red Sheriff counts this data to provide advertisers with an accurate picture of the global make-up of the network's vast audience, with the overall traffic audited by ABCe. -ends- For further information please contact: Anna Sinfield, Press Office, 020 7239 9818 Isabel Milner, Press Office, 020 7239 9602 Sources: Red Sheriff
